name: Smolder (TotallyGrape)
description:
Overview

Use your melee attack to attack and bounce around at the same time!

Go for a high score by hitting as many enemies as possible!

Controls

Move/Aim Attack:  ↑ /↓ /→/ ← or W/A/S/D

Attack: Z or Space

Tip!

Whatever direction you are holding when you attack is the direction you will attack in.
